roleset.name: to kneel or fawn

example.name: transitive
example.text: The Orwellian `` New World Information Order '' would give government officials rights against the press ; journalists-1 would be obliged [*-1] to kowtow to their government , which [*T*-28] would have licensing and censorship powers and , indeed , duties [*] to block printing of `` wrong '' ideas .

propbank.arg: to their government , which [*T*-28] would have licensing and censorship powers and , indeed , duties [*] to block printing of `` wrong '' ideas

roleset.note: KOWTOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'kowtow' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from kowtow.01-v predicate notes)
